column4: my friend has a liveCD running on his bustedUpWinXP box -- how can I get into his box (with his permission/help) so I can help him back some stuff up?
winXP won't boot so we need to get some files off of it -- he got openssh-server installed, but he probably doesn't know how to open 22 in his firewall
is there anything that he can initiate so I can get in?
tell him to boot off winXP cd, go into recovery console, and tye in help,  he should run the chkdsk with some options as well as fixmbr perhaps
